handmade.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%middlegame%' AND opening_tags LIKE '%Dutch_Defense%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%sacrifice%' AND themes LIKE '%fork%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE rating > 1900 OR themes LIKE '%master%'

handmade.text: Can you give me a quick puzzle
handmade.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%short%'

handmade.text: Give me a challenging puzzle that has a knight fork
handmade.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE rating > 1900 AND themes LIKE '%knightEndgame%' AND themes LIKE '%fork%'

handmade.text: I need a puzzle about the Queen's Gambit Declined in the beginning of the game
handmade.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Queens_Gambit_Declined%' AND themes LIKE '%opening%'

handmade.text: I want to get better at attacking
handmade.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE (themes LIKE '%kingsideAttack%' OR themes LIKE '%queensideAttack%') AND themes NOT LIKE '%defensiveMove%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Italian%' OR opening_tags LIKE '%Ruy_Lopez%' OR opening_tags LIKE '%Scotch%'

handmade.text: I want to beat my friend who keeps playing the Italian
handmade.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Italian%' AND themes LIKE '%crushing%' AND (themes LIKE '%opening%' OR themes LIKE '%middlegame%')

openai.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%middlegame%' AND opening_tags LIKE '%Slav_Defense%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%pin%' AND themes LIKE '%skewer%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE rating > 1900 OR themes LIKE '%master%'

openai.text: Can you suggest a short challenge?
openai.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%short%'

openai.text: Show me a classic endgame scenario.
openai.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%endgame%'

openai.text: Recommend a strategy for playing against the King's Indian Defense.
openai.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Kings_Indian_Defense%'

openai.text: I want to improve my tactical skills.
openai.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%crushing%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Italian%' OR opening_tags LIKE '%Ruy_Lopez%' OR opening_tags LIKE '%Scotch%'

openai.text: I want to find a way to counter the Italian opening effectively.
openai.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Italian%'

gemini.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%endgame%' AND opening_tags LIKE '%Dutch_Defense%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%discoveredAttack%'

gemini.text: Find me a puzzle with a beautiful mate.
gemini.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%Mate%'

gemini.text: Give me a difficult puzzle that involves a knight sacrifice.
gemini.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%sacrifice%' AND themes LIKE '%knightEndgame%'

gemini.text: Give me a puzzle with a kingside attack.
gemini.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%kingsideAttack%'

gemini.text: I want to improve my positional play.
gemini.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%quietMove%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%quietMove%'

gemini.text: I want to defeat my opponent who always plays the French.
gemini.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%French_Defense%'

llama.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%middlegame%' AND opening_tags LIKE '%Ruy_Lopez%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%discoveredAttack%' AND themes LIKE '%pin%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%opening%' AND themes LIKE '%quietMove%'

llama.text: Can you give me a moderate difficulty puzzle?
llama.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE rating > 800 AND rating < 1900

llama.text: Give me a puzzle that requires a clever knight sacrifice.
llama.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%sacrifice%' AND themes LIKE '%knightEndgame%'

llama.text: I need a puzzle about a variation of the Ruy Lopez opening.
llama.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Ruy_Lopez%'

llama.text: I want to improve my skills in defending against attacks.
llama.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%defensive_move%'

llama.text: I get bored with slow and positional games.
llama.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Italian%' OR opening_tags LIKE '%Ruy_Lopez%' OR opening_tags LIKE '%Scotch%'

llama.text: I want to improve my skills against players who specialize in endgames.
llama.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%endgame%'
